channel.title: [PI] shops
channel.description:
3 different things
1st - how do i add shops in to a PI server? 2nd - how do you add items into the shops? 3rd - How do you set the quantity, and the price of the items you put into the shops?

item.title: [PI] shops
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

item codes can be found in item.cfg located in the config folder.
Npc codes can be found in Npc.cfg located in the config folder.

The codes go where u need them like spawning in auto spawn,
Or opening a shop in actionhandler its up to you what you do with them.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] shops
item.dc:creator: @klub5tep klub5tep
item.description:
@klub5tep wrote:

I’m sorry i forgot about 2 more questions.

how do i find the item, and npc codes?

and do i have too put the codes anywhere specific?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] shops
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

ok well this is pretty easy and you’ll get the hang of it fast.

  1. to make a npc open a shop is actionhandler.java which is located in src/server/model/players just search for the other open shop cases and put yours in it.

example:

case 2:

 c.getPa().OpenShop (wrong code i just dont have a pi for refrence atm on a shard allstar right now)
  1. Prices are handled in price.txt located in config its code is

example: 4151(whip) 4000(4k)

Itemid Amount

3.shops.cfg same as delta itemid amount kind of thing, just use the shop codes above for references

example:

shop = 5 example shop 2 2 4151(itemid) 1(amount) and so on that way.

Read full topic
